story.description:
Implement HAIAMM Design Review (DR) practice at Level 1 maturity.

## Practice Overview

**Function:** Verification
**Purpose:** Review AI system designs for security flaws

## Level 1 Objectives

Establish basic design review process for AI systems.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Review process defined
  - Triggers identified (new systems, major changes)
  - Scope defined
  - Timing in SDLC established
  - Participants identified

- [ ] Review checklist created
  - Trust boundaries verification
  - Least privilege check
  - Input validation review
  - Output sanitization review
  - Architecture compliance check

- [ ] Documentation requirements set
  - Architecture diagrams required
  - Data flow descriptions required
  - Security considerations documented
  - Threat model reference required

- [ ] Review tracking implemented
  - Reviews recorded (date, system, reviewer)
  - Findings documented
  - Resolutions tracked
  - Metrics collected

## Definition of Done

- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Process documented and published
- [ ] Checklist available to reviewers
- [ ] First design review completed

## OWASP Risks Addressed

- ASI06: Memory & Context Poisoning
- LLM02: Sensitive Information Disclosure
- LLM04: Data and Model Poisoning
- LLM09: Misinformation

## Resources

- [DR Practice Guide](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/practices/DR-Software-OnePager.md)

## Verifhai Integration

Use `/verifhai-practice DR` for design review guidance.

subtasks.description: Document when, how, and who conducts design reviews.
